mapper.insert: INSERT INTO list (board_id, title, order_index, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{title}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT id, board_id, title, order_index AS orderIndex FROM list WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY order_index ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE list SET title = #{title}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
